title: Youth Academy
slogan: Introduction to Genomic Data Science run by NUIG Youth Academy.
description: A free, open source course providing secondary level students with a flavor of genomic data science.
bio: PhD student in Genomic Data Science, by way of Marist College Athlone, BSc Biotechnology & MSc Biomedical Genomics NUIG.
